description: My place is close to The City College of New York, The Edge Harlem, Londel's Supper Club, Fairway Market, and Bus Stop Restaurant. You’ll love my place because of the outdoors space, the neighborhood, the comfy bed, the kitchen, and the light. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: THE GETAWAY
review: False Advertisement!!! Property needs cleaning. Not hot water in the showers... had to take a cold shower on Dec 31 in New York!!!! If I could I would ask for my money back!!!!
